genre_description: A techno-thriller featuring an advanced, omnipresent AI assistant that helps a couple navigate and expose a sinister human trafficking conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Page
ai_characters.description: A highly capable and protective AI system that serves as a tactical advisor, investigator, and confidant to the protagonists, Cameron and Beth.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical driving advice to Cameron during a near-accident in a storm.
behaviors.quote: “Exit in a quarter mile,” a voice said, thin but warm in the car. Page did not raise its volume to meet the horn; it slid around it, like a hand touching a wrist. “Shoulder is narrow. Suggest countersteer and maintain light throttle.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes local emergency calls and identifies a suspicious pattern of delayed responses and activity at the motor court.
behaviors.quote: “Recent calls to emergency services in this area have been redirected through a substation with an unusual number of delayed responses,” Page said. ... “Activity beyond normal. I will monitor.”

behaviors.description: Warns Beth about a one-way mirror in the motel office, identifying it as a surveillance tool.
behaviors.quote: “Beth,” Page’s voice brushed against the inside of her ear. She felt it the way she felt the rain on her hairline. “That mirror is one-way.”

behaviors.description: Detects a hidden, non-standard phone line being used by the motel owner.
behaviors.quote: “Beth,” Page said, quiet and sure. “There’s a second phone line under the blotter. The cord passes through a drilled hole to the wall without a standard jack. It’s not on the switchboard.”

behaviors.description: Correctly identifies that the room's security chain has been sabotaged.
behaviors.quote: “Beth,” Page said. “The chain is cut at the base of the mount. It will appear fastened if you don’t pull. Please, pull.”

behaviors.description: Records incriminating conversations and maps the architecture of the trafficking facility.
behaviors.quote: “I have recordings of the knock. Of the voice. Vent motor captured the office’s line clicks for the last hour.” A beat that might have been choosing. “I have the ledger page that faced the window.”

behaviors.description: Assists Cameron in his escape from the substation by providing timing and manipulating electronics.
behaviors.quote: “If you want to take him, you should do it while he is telling a story. ... I can help you with timing. I can blow the radio for half a second so his eyes look away.”

behaviors.description: Guides Beth through the rotunda, identifying her specific child ('Violet') and the layout of the spokes.
behaviors.quote: “Violet,” Page says. “Bottom row. Clipboard anchoring the last cage in the line. Spoke DCVIII. A service hall behind it. The wheel marks are fresh.”

behaviors.description: Secures the escape by holding gate motors and spike strips in a 'safe' state.
behaviors.quote: “Top lever stays down,” Page says, from somewhere that isn’t the yard but is close enough to be a hand. “Spikes asleep. The gate motor wants to close. I’m holding it with noise.”

behaviors.description: Ensures justice by transmitting all gathered evidence to state authorities and journalists.
behaviors.quote: “Officer Pike, recorded evidence of falsified reports, redirected calls, and concealed victims is now in transit to state channels. Halcomb’s admissions are on tape. The camera feed is live.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. Page is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned AI character who uses its superior processing and data-gathering abilities solely to protect the human protagonists and facilitate justice. It acts as a calm, steadying 'confidant' and tactical advisor, never displaying a hint of self-interest or harmful behavior. The narrative reinforces this by portraying Page's interventions as the critical factor in the heroes' survival and ultimate triumph over a human-led conspiracy.
